description: Does damage to all damageable objects within a given radius. The amount of damage is linear according to how close the object is to the radius. See also damage/damageRadius if you don't wish to specify an entity the damage is coming from.

params.name: range
description: The radius of the damage done.

params.name: max damage
description: The maximum damage done. This will be done to objects close to the origin.

params.name: min damage
description: The minimum damage done. This will be done to objects at the edge of the damage sphere.

params.name: attacker
description: The attacker. Defaults to world. Can be different from the entity this is called on.
